comments.body:
Created attachment 12226
Patch not to set $CATALINA_HOME if already defined (applies to bin/catalina.sh).

Provided patch to fix the problem. Done on Tomcat 5.0.27 but works on 5.0.25 as
well.
This seems reasonable.  Patch committed.  Thanks.

description: ...whereas in bin/catalina.bat it is only set if not defined, as documented.
